documentation.text:
This list is going to be used for the twaps to be input into the price level checks.
 These are the addresses of the assets to be paired with ETH e.g. USDC or USDT
@dev This list is used to check if the relative price of the tokens are consistent

statements.documentation: Will start with this being the WETH/USD price, this can be modified later if desired.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[] memory,uint256[] memory) view returns (uint256[] memory)
function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,uint256) view returns (address)

GovernorChangeRequested(address).notice: Emmited when the governor is change is requested

GovernorChanged(address,address).notice: Emmited when the governor is changed

acceptGovernance().notice: Called by the pending governor to approve the change

changeGovernor(address).notice: Changes the governor can only be called by the current governor

getPriceUSD(address).notice: Quotes the USD price of `tokenAddress` The quoted price is always scaled with 18 decimals regardless of the source used for the oracle.

params.tokenAddress: the asset of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the USD price of the asset

getPricesUSD(address[]).notice: Quotes the USD price of `baseAssets` The quoted prices is always scaled with 18 decimals regardless of the source used for the oracle.

params.baseAssets: the assets of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the USD prices of the asset

getRobustWETHPrice(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: this function provides an estimate of the true WETH price. 1. Find the minimum TWAP price (or second minumum if >2 TWAP prices) from a given array. 2. Add this to an array of signed prices 3. Compute the median of this array

params.signedPrices: an array of prices from trusted providers (e.g. Chainlink, Coinbase, OKEx ETH/USD price)
params.twapPrices: an array of Time Weighted Moving Average ETH/stablecoin prices
